body: sorry vince  one must have got away   will contact dan shortly   conrad  at 08 04 am 6 5 00 -0500  you wrote     conrad     thanks for your message     there are 3 papers enron contributed to the last mepr     there is also another paper on electricity i contributed to the  red book   on us  power markets  as well as a paper or credit risk management  and a paper  on weather derivatives  all these papers included in other risk books were  written by enron  employees     we would like them included as well  if technically possible       i think that offering other energy related books through our site  in  addition to mepr2   is fine  but i would leave the decision to dan diamond  who is responsible  for the project       vince            conrad gardner  conrad risk co uk  on 06 05 2000 07 08 36 am    to    vince j kaminski enron com  cc   subject   enron site mepr2

subject: FW
body: i just received the paychecks  please see me to pick-up and sign for your check   mollie   -----original message----- from   ubsw energy general announcements   sent  wednesday  march 27  2002 7 47 am subject  march 28th paycheck information   houston employees   paychecks for the 3 28 pay date will be available to be picked up  ecs 05852  fifth floor  this wednesday march 27th at the following times   in order to keep the lines short  please try to arrive during the following times   we will need to have you show us a picture id  security badge  and sign off that you received your check   last names beginning with    a - g   1 00 - 1 30 pm  h - m   1 30 - 2 00 pm  n - s    2 00 - 2 30 pm  t - z     2 30 - 3 00 pm                                           items to be aware of this time around include the following   direct deposit started for many of you this pay period  however i do have your earnings statements to be picked up  employees with bus passes will notice that the bus pass amount will appear as both an earnings code and a deduction code  in order for imputed income to be calculated  gtl    portland employees   paychecks for portland employees will be distributed by mollie gustafson  later this afternoon    thanks  tony jarrett  713  584-7829 e-mail  anthony jarrett ubswenergy com

subject: Deal entry and P/l reporting
body: please note that effective immediately  we will no longer be reporting p l  this also means that at this point there is no need to flatten positions or do any type of deal entry  the risk group will continue to calculate books for credit purposes only   if you have any questions please don t hesitate to ask   john
